title: President's Park (White House): Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions           View of the WWII Memorial and Lincoln Memorial from the Washington Monument. NPS/W.Kim  National Mall and Memorial Parks The following National Park Service sites are all within 1.6 miles (2.5 km) walking distance from the White House Visitor Center.  Washington Monument World War II Memorial Constitution Gardens Vietnam Veterans Memorial Korean War Veterans Memorial Lincoln Memorial Martin Luther King, Jr. Memorial Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial Thomas Jefferson Memorial Ford's Theatre National Historic Site Belmont-Paul Women's Equality National Monument         Â    More National Park Service Sites in the Washington, DC Area  Rock Creek Park -Washington, DC Frederick Douglass National Historic Site -Washington, DC Kenilworth Park and Aquatic Gardens -Washington, DC Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site -Washington, DC Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park -DC, MD, WV George Washington Memorial Parkway -DC, MD, VA
